comment:
* An entity class that is passed to the
 * {@link DrmManagerClient.OnErrorListener#onError onError()} callback.
 *
 * @deprecated Please use {@link android.media.MediaDrm}

variables.name: TYPE_RIGHTS_NOT_INSTALLED
variables.comment: * Something went wrong installing the rights.

variables.name: TYPE_RIGHTS_RENEWAL_NOT_ALLOWED
variables.comment: * The server rejected the renewal of rights.

variables.name: TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED
variables.comment: * Response from the server cannot be handled by the DRM plug-in (agent).

variables.name: TYPE_OUT_OF_MEMORY
variables.comment:
* Memory allocation failed during renewal. Can in the future perhaps be used to trigger 
     * garbage collector.

variables.name: TYPE_NO_INTERNET_CONNECTION
variables.comment: * An Internet connection is not available and no attempt can be made to renew rights.

variables.name: TYPE_PROCESS_DRM_INFO_FAILED
variables.comment:
* Failed to process {@link DrmInfo}. This error event is sent when a
     * {@link DrmManagerClient#processDrmInfo processDrmInfo()} call fails.

variables.name: TYPE_REMOVE_ALL_RIGHTS_FAILED
variables.comment: * Failed to remove all the rights objects associated with all DRM schemes.

variables.name: TYPE_ACQUIRE_DRM_INFO_FAILED
variables.comment:
* Failed to acquire {@link DrmInfo}. This error event is sent when an
     * {@link DrmManagerClient#acquireDrmInfo acquireDrmInfo()} call fails.
